>
[Hobgoblin Lore](/Feats.aspx?ID=5570) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Hobgoblin" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=757" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 14 <sup>1.1</sup>

</column>

---

You've studied traditional hobgoblin exercises and fieldcraft, all of which have a militaristic bent. You gain the trained proficiency rank in [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=36) and [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=37). If you would automatically become trained in one of those skills (from your background or class, for example), you instead become trained in a skill of your choice. 

You gain the [Additional Lore](/Feats.aspx?ID=5114) general feat for [Hobgoblin Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=41).
name: Hobgoblin Lore
